          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hópárduc</string>
            <string language="en">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">snowpanther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">snowpanther</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hópárducot a szőrszálai közé szorult levegő óvja a fagytól</string>
            <string language="en">snowpanther avoids freezing with the help of the air </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hőszigetelés,  </string>
            <string language="en"> heat insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">snowpanther vermeidet, mit Hilfe der Luft 
einzufrieren</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le snowpanther évite de geler avec l'aide de 
l'air</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o snowpanther evita de congelar-se com a ajuda do
ar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lo snowpanther evita di congelare con l'aiuto 
dell'aria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">snowpanther αποφεύγει με τη βοήθεια του αέρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el snowpanther evita de congelar con la ayuda del
aire</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeisolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isolation thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">isolação de calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">isolamento termico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόνωση θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aislante de calor</string>
          </keyword>
